name: df-cshOLD
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccshOLD, cmpo(s0, s3, cab(s1, wrex(s2, cn0, wfn(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s2))))), cz, cif(emptycls, co(co(cv(s0), csubstr, cop(co(cv(s3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), cconcat, co(cv(s0), csubstr, cop(nat0, co(cv(s3), cmo, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))))
comment: Obsolete version of ~ df-csh as of 12-Oct-2022. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-May-2018.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro/ Alexander van der Vekens/Gerard Lang, 17-Nov-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)
